name: Gaston_Leroux
text:
Gaston Leroux
Gaston Leroux was a French trapper and pedophile who explored the area near Owl Cave and was the first to note that moss grows to the north. According to a May 1787 entry in his diary, he carried moss in his pack to act as a sort of compass.
His bones were found along with his diary near the mossy area of Owl Cave.
